item.title: 比特币期权交易商瞄准 30 万美元，创纪录高点指日可待
item.description: 比特币期权交易商正将目光投向更高的价格，而这种最大的加密货币正在徘徊于近期的历史高点。【原文：Bitcoin options traders are setting their sights on much higher prices while the largest cryptocurrency flirts with its fairly recent all-time high.】

item.title: Alphabet 的皮查伊称谷歌将更快地把产品推向市场
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌将更快地把产品推向市场，以跟上人工智能时代新对手的步伐。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google will bring products to market faster to keep pace with new rivals in the artificial intelligence age.】

item.title: 新日铁称关税提升了美国钢铁协议的重要性
item.description: 日本新日铁公司（Nippon Steel）的一位高管表示，随着关税和中国出口增长重塑全球金属市场，该公司以 141 亿美元竞购美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.【原文：Nippon Steel’s $14.1 billion bid for United States Steel Corp. is more important than ever as tariffs and rising Chinese exports reshape the global market for the metal, according to a top executive at the Japanese firm.】

item.title: 经济前景黯淡，新西兰将公布紧缩预算
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）将在本周的预算中严格控制支出，因为全球经济增长的不确定性阻碍了国内经济复苏，并限制了政府收入。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis will keep a tight rein on spending in this week’s budget as uncertainty about global growth holds back a domestic recovery and restrains government revenue.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨勒姆称关税可能会影响增长和就业
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，关税可能会拖累美国经济，削弱劳动力市场。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said tariffs will likely weigh on the US economy and weaken the labor market.】

item.title: 欧盟制裁帮助俄罗斯亚马尔液化天然气公司运输天然气的船只
item.description: 欧盟对帮助俄罗斯亚马尔液化天然气项目运输天然气货物的三艘船只实施了制裁，进一步挤压了莫斯科的能源收入。【原文：The European Union imposed sanctions on three vessels that helped move gas cargoes from Russia’s Yamal LNG project, further squeezing Moscow’s energy revenues.】

item.title: DoorDash 终止面向餐厅的人工智能语音订购产品
item.description: DoorDash Inc.在从一家人工智能初创公司挖来人才以加强该产品的一年后，结束了面向餐厅客户的语音点餐产品试点。【原文：DoorDash Inc. ended a pilot of its voice-ordering product for restaurant clients, a year after it poached talent from an artificial intelligence startup to bolster the product.】

item.title: 期权交易员将长期看跌美元的观点推高至创纪录水平
item.description: 根据一种常见的投资者情绪衡量标准，货币期权交易商现在比以往任何时候都更悲观地看待美元未来一年的走势。【原文：Currency options traders are now more pessimistic than they’ve ever been about the dollar’s path over the next year, according to one commonly-cited measure of investor sentiment.】

item.title: 卢比奥说：制裁有可能使俄罗斯放弃和谈
item.description: 据美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的高级外交官称，他认为如果美国威胁实施更多制裁，俄罗斯很可能会退出乌克兰和谈，这支持了白宫不向莫斯科施压的决定，尽管莫斯科抵制停火。【原文：President Donald Trump thinks Russia will likely walk away from Ukraine peace talks if the US threatens more sanctions, according to his top diplomat, supporting the White House’s decision not to pressure Moscow despite its resistance to a ceasefire.】

item.title: 发生地震活动后，艾芬豪公司暂停刚果铜矿的开采工作
item.description: 艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.）在经历了 "地震活动 "之后，暂停了其位于刚果民主共和国的巨型铜矿的部分作业。【原文：Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. paused some operations at its giant copper mine in the Democratic Republic of the Congo after experiencing “seismic activity.”】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Cohere 首席执行官称今年销售额翻了一番
item.description: Cohere Inc.首席执行官艾丹-戈麦斯（Aidan Gomez）表示，自今年年初以来，这家人工智能初创公司的营收已 "翻了一番多"，并已接近盈利，尽管它还面临着 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 对企业客户的激烈竞争。【原文：Cohere Inc. Chief Executive Officer Aidan Gomez said the artificial intelligence startup has “more than doubled” its revenue since the start of this year and is approaching profitability, even as it faces heightened competition for business customers from OpenAI and Anthropic.】

item.title: 苹果公司将向开发者开放人工智能模型，打赌这将刺激新应用程序的开发
item.description: 苹果公司正准备允许第三方开发者使用其人工智能模型编写软件，旨在刺激新应用的开发，使其设备更具吸引力。【原文：Apple Inc. is preparing to allow third-party developers to write software using its artificial intelligence models, aiming to spur the creation of new applications and make its devices more enticing.】

item.title: 与印度冲突后，巴基斯坦晋升陆军总司令
item.description: 本月，巴基斯坦将其陆军总司令晋升为元帅，以纪念该国在与印度半个世纪以来最严重的军事对抗中取得的成功。【原文：Pakistan promoted its army chief to field marshal to mark the country’s success in the most serious military confrontation with India in half a century this month.】

item.title: 南非总统在与特朗普会晤前发表乐观言论
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会晤前发出了乐观的声音，这位南非领导人希望这次会晤将修复两国之间脆弱的关系。【原文：President Cyril Ramaphosa struck an upbeat tone before a meeting with US counterpart Donald Trump, which the South African leader hopes will repair frayed ties between the countries.】

item.title: 加密货币企业家孙正义将参加特朗普的 Memecoin 晚宴
item.description: 备受争议的加密货币企业家孙正义（Justin Sun）宣布，他将参加本周晚些时候与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）举行的一场高规格晚宴。【原文：Controversial crypto entrepreneur Justin Sun announced that he’s joining a high-profile dinner with the US President Donald Trump later this week.】

item.title: 美国将把雪佛龙委内瑞拉豁免权再延长 60 天
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，随着美国继续与委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗的政府就遣返航班和美国在委内瑞拉被拘留者的命运进行谈判，特朗普政府将把雪佛龙公司停止在委内瑞拉运营的最后期限再延长60天。【原文：The Trump administration is set to extend Chevron Corp.’s deadline to halt its operations in Venezuela by another 60 days as the US continues negotiations with President Nicolas Maduro’s government over repatriation flights and the fate of US detainees in the country, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 田纳西流域管理局寻求建造 GE Vernova 反应堆
item.description: 田纳西河流域管理局正在采取措施建造一座小型模块化核反应堆；在数据中心电力需求激增的背景下，这是美国第一家寻求联邦批准建造此类项目的公用事业公司。【原文：The Tennessee Valley Authority is taking steps to build a small modular nuclear reactor — the first US utility to seek federal approval for such a project amid a surge in power demand from data centers.】

item.title: 加尔达对冲基金首席投资官称债券市场的财政反叛尚未结束
item.description: Garda Capital Partners 的蒂姆-马格努森（Tim Magnusson）认为，债券市场对华盛顿财政大手大脚的反抗远未结束。【原文：The bond-market revolt against Washington’s fiscal largess is far from over, according to Garda Capital Partners’ Tim Magnusson, who says a rapid increase in yields is likely the only thing that will motivate Congress to rein in the deficit.】

item.title: 银行将为梅赫莱宁发行 10 亿欧元高收益债券
item.description: 一组银行正准备为芬兰医疗保健公司梅希莱宁（Mehiläinen）推出约10亿欧元（11亿美元）的高收益债券销售。【原文：A group of banks are preparing to launch a roughly €1 billion ($1.1 billion) sale of high yield bonds for Finnish health care firm Mehiläinen.】

item.title: 欧洲企业有望实现价值 1000 亿美元的分拆上市
item.description: 许多欧洲公司正在制定业务部门上市计划，总价值超过 1,000 亿美元，这在资本市场活动低迷的情况下成为一个亮点。【原文：A slew of European companies are working on plans to list business units worth more than $100 billion combined, offering a bright spot amid muted capital markets activity.】

item.title: 欧洲债券销售创纪录地突破 1 万亿欧元
item.description: 即使在特朗普政府全面征收关税导致市场短暂关闭之后，欧洲银行家们安排的债务销售额仍以有史以来最快的速度突破了1万亿欧元（1.13万亿美元）。【原文：Debt sales arranged by bankers across Europe have surged past €1 trillion ($1.13 trillion) for the year in the quickest time ever, even after the market briefly shut down following the Trump administration’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 在菲利普斯 66 之战中，埃利奥特首次面临美国代理投票
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）在针对美国公司开展了百余次活动后，首次在本土进行代理投票。【原文：After more than a hundred campaigns targeting US companies, Elliott Investment Management is heading into its first ever proxy vote on home ground.】

item.title: 非洲大亨埃卢梅卢称尼日利亚货币趋于稳定
item.description: 尼日利亚大亨托尼-埃卢梅卢表示，尼日利亚货币近几个月来一直保持稳定，使投资者能够更好地规划在这个非洲人口最多国家的活动。【原文：Nigeria’s currency has been stable in recent months, allowing investors to better plan for activities in Africa’s most populous nation, according to tycoon Tony Elumelu.】

item.title: 深度伪造为何无处不在？可以阻止它们吗？
item.description: 互联网上充斥着大量 "深度伪造"（deepfakes —）；利用人工智能工具制作的音频、图片或视频中，人们似乎做了或说了他们没有做的事，出现在他们不在的地方，或改变了他们的外表。有些涉及裸体化，即修改照片以描绘某人未穿衣服的样子。还有一些深度伪造被用来欺骗消费者，或损害政客和其他公众人物的名誉。【原文：The internet is awash in deepfakes — audio, pictures or video made using artificial intelligence tools in which people appear to do or say things they didn’t, be somewhere they weren’t, or that change their appearance. Some involve nudification, where photos are altered to depict someone unclothed. Other deepfakes are deployed to scam consumers, or to damage the reputations of politicians and other people in the public eye.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长温希表示经济可能需要利率的支持
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员皮埃尔-翁施（Pierre Wunsch）表示，欧元区经济可能需要 "温和支持性 "的利率水平，以确保在一系列冲击之后通胀率不会低于目标。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch said the euro-zone economy may need interest rates at “mildly supportive” levels to ensure inflation doesn’t fall below target after a series of shocks.】

item.title: 亚马逊的 Zoox 公司在亚特兰大将机器人出租车试验扩展到了竞争对手的草坪上
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）旗下的 Zoox 正在亚特兰大扩大自动驾驶技术的测试范围，进军 Alphabet 公司旗下 Waymo 与优步公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s Zoox is expanding testing of its autonomous driving technology to Atlanta, moving in on a market where Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo is expanding with Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 马斯克表示未来五年将继续担任特斯拉首席执行官
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他将在五年内担任特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Elon Musk said he’s committed to leading Tesla Inc. as chief executive officer in five years’ time, easing the concerns of some investors wary about his level of commitment to the carmaker.】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数连升六日逼近牛市后美国股市表现低迷
item.description: 美国股市在连续六个交易日攀升后，周二有所回落，投资者在等待美联储的一系列讲话，并对企业财报进行分析。【原文：US equities edged lower on Tuesday after climbing for six consecutive trading sessions, with investors awaiting a bevy of Federal Reserve speeches and parsing corporate earnings.】

item.title: 美国投资的南非氦气生产商获得华盛顿公司的收购要约
item.description: 一家由美国政府出资 5.4 亿美元的南非氦气公司收到了来自华盛顿特区 ASP Isotopes 公司的收购要约。【原文：A South African helium and gas company, to which the US government has committed $540 million in funding, has received a takeover bid from Washington DC-based ASP Isotopes Inc.】
